title: Bump for 2 for 1 rune page sale.
body:
Been hard here in Australia fighting fires and what not, I believe Oceania should put on a 2 for 1 rune page sale deal. That would be awesome! if this could get as many bumps as possible that would be really cool!
As some say it will be.
GREAT SUCCESS! :D
thanks riot for this awesome game and I hope everyone bumps this thread. :)

replies.body: They literally just had one of those sales like 2 weeks ago...
happened around 3 weeks ago get with the picture dj sona is the HYPE right now
